host.label: Host IP address or hostname
host.description: Specify the IP address or hostname of the data source

port.label: Host port
port.description: Set the port number that is associated with the hostname or IP address.

unmapped_fallback.label: Enable Unmapped Fallback
unmapped_fallback.description: Enable unmapped fallback to capture unmapped fields.

accessToken.label: Access Token
accessToken.description: An access token for the Tanium Threat Response API.
